fields.name: time_ISO8601
fields.title: Date time
fields.description: Date and time at the end of each time interval of one hour in the ISO 8601 format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss+00:00 [UTC]

fields.name: maskcw_12h
fields.title: Cold warm advection 12 hour event mask
fields.description: mask of all cold (-1) and warm (1) advection events of a length of at least 12h. (0) flags denote no cold or warm advection event.

fields.name: maskcw_6h
fields.title: Cold warm advection 6 hour event mask
fields.description: mask of all cold (-1) and warm (1) advection events of a length of at least 6h. (0) flags denote no cold or warm advection event.

fields.name: maskcw_all
fields.title: Cold warm advection all events mask
fields.description: mask of all cold (-1) and warm (1) advection events. (0) flags denote no cold or warm advection event.

fields.name: filter_sif
fields.title: Sea ice proximity filter
fields.description: filter for proximity to sea ice. (1) indicates time steps, when the ACE track was close to or within sea ice. (0) flags denote when track was not close to or within sea ice.

fields.name: filter_lsm
fields.title: Land mass proximity filter
fields.description: filter for proximity to land masses in the ECMWF model data. (1) indicates time steps, when the ACE track was close to land or to a model grid point which lies within land area. (0) flags denote when track was not close to or within land area.
